  sname
  hiddenFormat
  sdescription
  <p>{String} hiddenFormat Format of datetime used to store value in hidden field and submitted to server (defaults to 'Y-m-d H.i.s' that is mysql format)</p>
  LvalidateOnBlur
  false
  LallowDecimals

  @/@timePosition
  sname
  timePosition
  sinputtype
  select
  sdefault
  'right'
  sdescription
  <p>{String} timePosition Where the time field should be rendered. 'right' is suitable for forms &nbsp;and 'below' is suitable if the field is used as the grid editor (defaults to 'right')</p>
  LvalidateOnBlur
  false
  LallowDecimals
  false
  LallowNegative
  false
  sdescriptors
